titles.title: Social Security Fairness for the Terminally Ill Act of 2011
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the five-month waiting period in the disability insurance program, and for other purposes.
Social Security Fairness for the Terminally Ill Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary: Social Security Fairness for the Terminally Ill Act of 2011 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the waiting period for disability insurance benefits for terminally ill individuals.
